title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the District Court (Days and Hours) (August
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the District Court (Days and Hours) (August 

sittings) Amended Order 2025
text_norm: 1 order may cited district court (days hours) (august sittings) amended order 2025

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on the 1st of August 2025.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on the 1st of August 2025.

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 3. Sittings for the purposes of Article 5(b) of the District Court Areas
text_raw:
3. Sittings for the purposes of Article 5(b) of the District Court Areas 
(Amendment) Order 1970 (S.I. No. 161 of 1970) shall be held during the month 
of August in and for each District Court area referred to in column (2) of the 
table to this Order (in each case serving the relevant District Court district 
mentioned in column (1) of the table immediately opposite such reference). 
Where such sittings are not held on such days, and at such hours and at the place 
for the time being fixed for sittings of the District Court for the purpose of 
transacting the business of the District Court exercising its summary jurisdiction 
in such District Court area by the District Court (Areas) Order 1961 (S.I. No. 5 
of 1961)(as amended)(the “Principal Order”), such sittings shall be held on such 
days, and at such hours referred to in column (3) of the table immediately 
opposite the District Court area referred to in column (2).

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before the commencement of the Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025.
